Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the length of time the candidates were speechless, stating it was 20 seconds when in fact it was only a two-second pause.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a video without any additional evidence or context.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the candidates' silence is indicative of their lack of experience in starting a business, without considering other possible reasons for their silence.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation for the candidates' silence, stating that the video was selectively edited to splice together unrelated moments of expressive faces from the candidates.
